I am looking for a name for the god of the dead (who will be a cleric) 
that fits within the the framework of Gladiator.  He/she will 
initially have an experience level 100 and then will jump to 
experience level 200.  I will be pitting this person against an evil 
archmage (who needs a name) who is experience level 150-175.  I just 
hope no person goes through that scenario (with the archmage) with a 
large army or game crashes might occur.

To balance out the scales, I plan on leaving blood spots around as 
well tents and bonepiles.

By the way, I have finished all scenarios up to #159 of my set.  6 
more scenarios to go!!  I never plan on trying to complete another set 
of scenarios by myself.
